entries.journal_entry_description: A droid engineer needs a central processing chip from one of the droids on the lower level.  Disable the droids and recover one of those chips.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Take the elevator to the lower level.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Head down the lower level and disable the crazy droids until you find an Intact Central Processing Core. Bring it back to help the Engineer find out who is trying to sabotage the station.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Get a Central Processing Core from the Droid Repair Center
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Take the elevator to the main level so you can get your reward.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Main Level
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The Droid Engineer is going to be interested in the chip that you found on the droid. Bring it back to him in the Armory.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Return to the Droid Engineer in the Ranged Combat Training Room
